content.question: Based on the class specification, which of the following descriptions is accurate?

choices.label: Robot objects are attributes of the methods move and rotate.
Robot objects are behaviors of the methods move and rotate.
The methods move and rotate represent attributes of Robot objects.
The methods move and rotate represent behaviors of Robot objects.

content.answer: The methods move and rotate represent behaviors of Robot objects.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
